name: Mango (Fresh)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of other fruits
Rich in vitamin C, vitamin A, and antioxidants
benefits: Fresh mango contains approximately 83-84% water, making it a water-rich fruit choice for weight loss. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, mango provides natural sweetness and volume. In the cookbook, mango is blended into salad dressing, demonstrating how water-rich fruits can add flavor and nutrition without added oils.
amount: 1 ripe mango, peeled, pitted, and coarsely chopped (for dressing serving 4)
